metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27416 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Tcpreplay v4.4.1 was discovered to contain a double-free via __interceptor_free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27416` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.4.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-2').
